nodes.text: A mineral was a natural compound with intricate structure formed through geological processes. Examples of minerals included halite, quartz, mica, and those used as lightsaber crystals.
Ores were generally comprised of minerals of economic importance or industrial value.
Permex was a substance that utilized an injection of mineral solution into polymeric plastic.
Azurite was a highly prized mineral commonly found in mines. Ionite was another highly prized mineral found in mines but not so commenly found and more valuable.
